alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:47AM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with localized higher amounts possible near Tupper Lake. * WHERE...Southern Franklin County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lake band is expected to enter southern Franklin County this morning, and then gradually shift south of the area by Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
